name: botbuilder
description: A step tracking, bot building, tactics game

scripts.build: docker compose build prod-ui && docker compose run prod-ui && docker compose build prod-server
scripts.publish: docker tag botbuilder-prod-server zachanator070/botbuilder:latest && docker login -u="$(DOCKER_USERNAME)" -p="$(DOCKER_PASSWORD)" && docker push zachanator070/botbuilder:latest

author: zachanator070
